March 15, 2024 - Bemz is all about personalization. The brand specializes in creating made to order, high quality covers for IKEA furniture so people can update their sofas, chairs and other items of furniture in their home to better reflect their personal style.

1 day ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.
